price: 64 Unissons donc nos forces et serrons les rangs, car celui qui prendra le dessus aujourd’hui triomphera. »
arabic: فَأَجۡمِعُواْ كَيۡدَكُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱئۡتُواْ صَفّٗاۚ وَقَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَعۡلَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-ajmiʿū kaydakum thumma i'tū ṣaffan waqad aflaḥa al-yawma mani is'taʿlā
